title: Trade war threats cast long shadow in China
text:
Trade war threats cast long shadow in China 6:52am EDT - 01:51
Chinese businesses across the country have been telling Reuters they are feeling the threat of a trade war between the U.S. and China. As Sareena Darayam reports some are already feeling tangible impacts, shifting sales elsewhere or scrapping factory expansion plans.
